text.headline: Schwabe's Sunspot Cycle
text.text: Samuel Heinrich Schwabe discovers the regular sunspot cycle, marking a pivotal moment in solar physics.

text.headline: Alfvén's MHD Concept
text.text: Hannes Alfvén introduces the concept of magnetohydrodynamics (MHD), foundational for understanding plasma behavior in magnetic fields.

text.headline: Parker's Solar Wind
text.text: Eugene Parker proposes the solar wind concept, hinting at magnetic fields' role in solar-Earth particle interactions.

text.headline: Magnetic Reconnection Coined
text.text: The term 'magnetic reconnection' is introduced, describing how magnetic field lines can break and reconnect.

text.headline: Reconnection in Magnetosphere
text.text: Reconnection sites in Earth's magnetosphere are confirmed through satellite observations.

text.headline: Magnetic Flux Ropes Detected
text.text: Scientists detect magnetic flux ropes, twisted magnetic structures associated with reconnection, in Earth's magnetotail.

text.headline: WIND Satellite Launch
text.text: The WIND satellite is launched to study the solar wind's influence on Earth's magnetosphere.

text.headline: ACE Satellite Insights
text.text: ACE (Advanced Composition Explorer) satellite is launched, providing insights into solar particles and magnetic fields.

text.headline: SOHO Reveals Solar Flares
text.text: The SOHO satellite provides images of solar flares, shedding light on magnetic reconnection on the Sun.

text.headline: THEMIS Mission Insights
text.text: THEMIS mission provides evidence of magnetic reconnection causing substorms in Earth's magnetosphere.

text.headline: DSCOVR Watches Space Weather
text.text: DSCOVR (Deep Space Climate Observatory) satellite is launched, observing real-time space weather conditions.

text.headline: MMS Mission Launch
text.text: MMS (Magnetospheric Multiscale) mission is launched to deeply study reconnection.

text.headline: MMS Reveals Electron-Scale Physics
text.text: MMS captures high-res data, revealing electron-scale physics of magnetic reconnection.

text.headline: 3D Modeling Breakthrough
text.text: Advances in tech allow 3D modeling of magnetic reconnection events.
